Item.Value: Hello $^$, settling in well I hope? How are you finding the town so far? If you ever need anything, you know where to find me.
Hello, $^$! What brings you into town today?
My mother was mayor before me. I'm glad that the townsfolk placed their trust in me to lead them in her footsteps.
Oh, hello $^$, What can I do for you? [Talk:Talk|Construct Buildings:BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings:Maintenance|Never Mind:Cancel]
Oh? Why, thank you for the kind thought.
Yes? How can I help you?[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|Never Mind:Cancel]
I hope the manor isn't leaking too much in all of this rain.
Oh! This is very thoughtful of you. How did you know I was looking for this? Thank you.
